short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace asset with local file to test it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Test local assets on Nissan VLP+ pages. Simply right click on desired block and choose "Nissan VLP+ asset tester" from context menu. Works with photos and videos. Assets will be visible only on your local machine, so you can easily test even embargoed files.
